body.name: Bellemain Over The Sink Dish Drying Rack - Silicone Dish Drying Mat, Space Saving Drying Rack for Kitchen Sink, Stainless Steel Dish Rack Over Sink - Multipurpose Sink Drying Rack (Gray, Medium)

features: OVER THE SINK DISH DRYING RACK: Bellemain’s signature dish drainer is a versatile addition to your kitchen accessories. Our silicone over the sink drying rack is handy for drying dishes, rinsing vegetables, and protecting countertops from hot pots.

ROLL UP DRYING RACK: Our dish drying rack over the sink expands to fit your space, from dish drying racks for the kitchen counter to cooling rack, to kitchen dish drying rack. Bellemain’s multipurpose stainless steel dish rack easily rolls up for compact storage when not in use.

AVAILABLE IN 2 SIZES: This compact, space-saving kitchen drying rack is available in two sizes over your kitchen sink. The medium size dish rack measures 18” wide and fits sinks up to 16” wide. The large-size dry rack measures 20.5” wide and fits sinks up to 18.5” wide.

SILICONE & STAINLESS STEEL: Each collapsible dish drying rack is forged with high-quality stainless steel that can support over 24 lbs. The soft, strong silicone coating on this heat-resistant mat is gentle on your dishes, heat resistant up to 400°, and dishwasher safe.

KITCHEN MUST HAVES: The simplicity and versatility of our roll up dish drying rack make it a worthy option for your wedding registry items, kitchen organization, kitchen essentials for new home, or first apartment must haves.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Bellemain's Roll-up Drying Rack Introducing Bellemain's Over the Sink Dish Drying Rack: Your Ultimate Kitchen Companion! Our foldable dish drying rack is more than just a kitchen accessory – it's a versatile workhorse. This silicone dish drying mat is perfect for drying your dishes, rinsing your veggies, and providing a safe spot for hot pots on your countertop.

Enhance Your Kitchen Efficiency with Our Roll Up Dish Drying Rack Experience Kitchen Versatility with Bellemain's Roll-Up Dish Drying Rack. This adaptable rack easily transitions from a kitchen counter dish drying rack to a cooking rack and even a sink drying rack. Its convenient roll-up design ensures effortless storage, making it a space-saving solution. Upgrade your kitchen with this versatile and efficient accessory, simplifying meal preparation and cleanup.

Bellemain Kitchen Rack: Elevating Your Culinary Experience Effortless Drying Embrace the simplicity of dishwashing. With our versatile rack, washing, rinsing, and drying your dishes becomes a breeze. Enjoy a spacious and efficient drying space that keeps your dishes sparkling clean. Space-Saving Design Experience the ultimate convenience with our space-saving design. Whether you need it compact for storage or expanded to accommodate your kitchen tasks, it adapts perfectly to your needs, every single time. Multi-Purpose Perfection for Culinary Creations It's more than just a dish drying rack. From sizzling fried favorites to freshly baked delights, our rack transforms into the ideal spot for cooling and draining your culinary creations. Elevate your cooking experience with Bellemain.

Versatile Durability at Your Service Bellemain's roll-up rack redefines kitchen functionality. Our soft-touch, non-slip silicone safeguards your surfaces from scratches. Plus, this powerhouse can support up to 50 lbs of kitchen essentials without breaking a sweat. And when you're done, it folds up seamlessly for easy, compact storage. Discover unmatched durability and convenience in one innovative design.

The Essential Kitchen Companion Bellemain simplifies your kitchen routine. Our over-the-sink rack provides extra space for prepping, dish drying, and more, perfectly fitting sinks up to 16.5 inches wide. Crafted with heat-resistant silicone and robust stainless steel, it can support over 24 pounds, setting the standard for durability. Compact and versatile, it rolls up for easy storage, ensuring you cook more and worry less. Embrace 'The Bellemain Standard' and elevate your kitchenware game today.

ABOUT BELLEMAIN French for “beautiful hands”, the Bellemain name represents the very best in kitchen tools and products at exceptional values. Our products aren’t just crafted with the intent of filling your cupboard – they’re built with passion and craftsmanship. Prior to designing our collections, we research and curate the most popular and innovative products in the market, then diligently craft in our own design and innovation, to create the ultimate in style and function. Based in the metropolitan New York area, we have been serving customers across the US since 2007. Our meticulous taste and passion for quality means we only carry products we feel confident standing behind. With our enduring commitment to unsurpassed quality and design, our products leave you free to savor all of life’s joyous moments! Whether you’re a novice or a professional chef, you’ll need the very best tools to get the best results from your culinary efforts. When you buy Bellemain you’re not just buying a tool, you’re becoming part of our family. Enjoy Cooking – Enjoy Family – Enjoy Life! Live a Full and Happy Life with Bellemain Today!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great, dual purpose product
reviews.reviewText: I can't speak highly enough about this. I use it both as extra drying rack space and also as just extra counter space (as I have a small kitchen). It is also very sturdy, as it routinely holds my large cast iron dutch oven with no problems. It is easy to clean... I usually just wipe it down, but also have thrown it in the dishwasher with no problems. Lastly, it rolls up nicely when not in use and stores easily under the sink. Totally recommend the product for anyone who needs a space-efficient drying rack or extra counter space.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works Well, Looks Good
reviews.reviewText: This feels and looks like good quality, and at a reasonable price, about $20. We've been using it for a two or three weeks and we are happy with it. Fits our sink perfectly (good to measure before you buy) and clears our counter for more work space. I dry and roll it frequently. It fit 3 pans and lids and some utensils and bowls, carefully, tonight! My only regret is not buying it sooner.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Solid steel rods, silicone covered; heavy duty!
reviews.reviewText: I read many reviews before ordering and am 100% happy with this purchase. The rods are solid steel, not hollow, and the silicone coating all over makes it totally non-slip; that's exactly what I need so I can put pots of boiling water, etc on it when camping and have no worries about it failing on me. I went out on a limb and bought the green one - if it didn't work I could return/exchange for grey, but it's a beautiful, stylish green with a nod to teal and I'm definitely keeping it.FYI I ordered the Large for a 20.7 inch (at widest) camping side-stove-table and it works. My sink, also pictured, is 17" wide and it also works fine there.Worth every penny! Top quality and will last years I'm sure.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for a farmhouse sink to save counter space
reviews.reviewText: You can roll up easily or keep extended. What a clever device as a drying rack! It washes up well too by just using a soapy sponge. It saves space because we don’t have to put a dry rack on the counter. This is perfect for farmhouse sinks.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 10, 2021
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Better quality than expected. I recommend this even if you have a dishwasher for holding plants/pots, or when you need a second level. This is a large, fits my big sink. Easy to clean, and hide away, zero rusting because of the silicone, and no counter top / stainless steel scratches, VERY sturdy and most importantly this is not an eye sore. Simple, but so effective.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Saves counter space
reviews.reviewText: I live in a rental with one of those kitchens that is large in square footage, but ridiculously lacking in counter space and useable storage—just lots of open floor space. I’m hopeful that this rack will help free up much-needed counter space by providing a place to set hot pots, drain washed fruits and vegetables, and air dry a small number of washed cookware. I have a single sink and the rack covers half of it, which makes the drying function a little difficult—I have to wash pots, etc., set them on the counter, drain the sink, and then rinse them and set them on the rack to dry. Of course, the size of the rack also limits how much can fit on it. It’s sturdy, easy to clean, and takes up little storage space. I recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Works really well. Very sturdy - I’ve put a hot Dutch oven on it with no issues. Definitely great for draining dishes,etc. Very happy with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 12, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing! Great for dishes, extra counter space, washing produce, and more!
reviews.reviewText: I have a relatively large sink, but a small kitchen with limited countertop space so I am always looking for ways to add extra space anywhere I can. I also LOATHE drainers on my countertops because they take up room and are ugly. This roll up dish drying rack provides a solution to that and so much more! No more puddles of water under your dishes, it all goes right into the sink. You can have dishes drying and still have some sink space left to wash. I use this rack to rinse off my veggies and fruits and the water goes straight into the sink. I can have dirty dishes on one side of my sink under the drainer and still wash and place clean dishes on top giving me more time and space when baking as I use every dish in the house when I cook. The drainer will roll away and store easily under the sink. I don't usually do that because I always have dishes needing a good wash up. Additionally, it is not unattractive when it is unrolled so I don't bother putting it away, I just roll it up and let it sit as seen in the photos. Admittedly, it works better with larger sinks, but there are several sizes so look them up and give it a try. The material is rubber coated and heavy enough not to bend when weight is on it. I can't think of anything that could be better about this except maybe if they had it in the color of my sink! (Coffee) You will not be disappointed if you buy this drying rack. Promise.
Es un accesorio perfecto para aprovechar el espacio de la tarja.
El material del que está hecho es de excelente calidad.
Es de buen tamaño, resistente. Pero en lo personal no es tan funcional en mi hogar, somos 3 personas y la cantidad de loza que se lava en cada comida es más de la que se puede colocar en la rejilla.
